dmca.title: [Fwd: FW: [Fwd: [ABUSE] website copyright]]
dmca.body:
nc 

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, August 02, 2005 1:18 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com; jeraldstraub@adelphia.net
Subject: [Fwd: FW: [Fwd: [ABUSE] website copyright]]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: FW: [Fwd: [ABUSE] website copyright]
Date: Tue, 2 Aug 2005 07:11:32 -0700
From: adelphia <jeraldstraub@adelphia.net>
To: <abuse@theplanet.com>

Hello,

When make so one of my site pages give a error 500, this is what appears as
an error from blueseamall.com

Warning:
file_get_contents(http://thefreestuffvault.com/dirSports_and_Outdoors_Exerci
se_and_Fitness.htm): failed to open stream: HTTP request failed! HTTP/1.1
500 Internal Server Error in /home/wc/public_html/blueseamall/index.php on
line 19

This website blueseamall is using some kind of a get command to copy my
site.

Just thought this might be helpful in proving he is copying my website
pages.


Jerald
Webmaster
thefreestuffvault.com

- -----Original Message-----
From: adelphia [mailto:jeraldstraub@adelphia.net]
Sent: Monday, August 01, 2005 6:40 AM
To: admin@blueseamall.com
Subject: FW: [Fwd: [ABUSE] website copyright]


Hello Jie Zheng,

The design of the web site www.thefreestuffvault.com belongs to Jairnet
Online & Partners and may not be reproduced either in whole or in part
without prior written consent from its owner. Please remove the content
located at blueseamall.com immediately.

Jerald
Webmaster
http://thefreestuffvault.com

- -----Original Message-----
From: adelphia [mailto:jeraldstraub@adelphia.net]
Sent: Monday, July 18, 2005 2:11 PM
To: support@hostdeal.com
Subject: FW: [Fwd: [ABUSE] website copyright]


Hello Jeff,

Plagiarism, and a copyright violation of my site located at
http://thefreestuffvault.com by the following domain:
http://www.blueseamall.com which is hosted my theplanet.com.

I was told by a friend to forward you about this issue, so you are apprized
of what is going on.

Thanks

Jerald Straub, Webmaster
Jairnet Online, Inc.
34428 Yucaipa Blvd E-335
Yucaipa, CA 92399


- -----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com]
Sent: Friday, July 01, 2005 10:15 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com; Jeraldstraub@adelphia.net
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] website copyright]


Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] website copyright
Date: Thu, 30 Jun 2005 18:42:44 -0700
From: Jerald <Jeraldstraub@adelphia.net>
To: <abuse@theplanet.com>

Hello,

I am the webmaster of http://www/thefreestuffvault.com and I came upon this
website www.blueseamall.com a few days ago and noticed that somehow they are
masking my site as if it were their own using some kind of database or mod.
I have tried to contact the technical contact for this website and have left
several messages on the answering machine. Have this site copy my content is
hurting my search engine rankings. I ask that you please contact this
individual and have them remove the content.


The individuals name as from whois is:

Jie Zheng admin@blueseamall.com)
   +1.5107993516
   Fax: +1.5107962217
   P.O. Box 8081
   Fremont, CA 94537
   US

and the site was created on Creation date: 21 May 2005 00:43:32

and as you can see my site was created on Creation date: 19 Sep 2002
00:00:00

Please have this content removed immediately.


Thank you for you time concerning this issue.

Jerald Straub, Webmaster
Jairnet Online, Inc.
34428 Yucaipa Blvd E-335
Yucaipa, CA 92399

http://Getwhatsontv.com
http://Handy-shopping-mall.com
http://thefreestuffvault.com
http://discountfitnessshop.com
http://pluswomenclothing.com




- --
Thanks,
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/



- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html

Comment: Using GnuPG with Thunderbird - http://enigmail.mozdev.org
